item.title: CSV output formatter for WCF Data Services
item.description: The OData URL conventions says that one can specify the media type of the response in the query, using the query parameter $format. The requested media type can also be negociated through http content-type headers. However, Microsoft included only the default Atom formatter in their implementation (WCF Data Services). A Json formatter can be included with a quick workaround). With the code below, you can query a OData WCF Data Service and receive a csv file in the response.
